content: उत्पट् {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To root up, extirpate, eradicate, pull up by the roots; <ls>R. 15. 19</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 43.</ls> {@--2@} To tear up or out, draw out; दंतैर्नोत्पाटयेन्नखान् <ls>Ms. 4. 69</ls>; कीलमुत्पाटयन् <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To remove, dispel; भय, रुषं, कोपं &c.; राज्यात् to depose.
